content: Welcome to Potrero Mining Poolhttp://pool.potrerocoin.comThe pool is for mining Potrero coins.https://potrerocoin.orgpayout: PPLNSreward: every minutefee: 1%algo: Scryptprotocol: stratumminer: stratum+tcp://pool.potrerocoin.com:3000username: <your Potrero wallet address>password: <anything>SupportIRC channels on Freenode: #potrero-mininghttps://webchat.freenode.netFeel free to reach out if you have any questions.Happy mining!
